DOC.brief_summary: To develop and validate the predictive warfarin dosing algorithm.
DOC.brief_title: PGx Study to Develop and Validate the Predictive Warfarin Dosing Algorithm for Personalized Warfarin Pharmacotherapy
DOC.detailed_description: This study aims to develop and validate the predictive warfarin dosing algorithm for personalized warfarin pharmacotherapy in Korean patients.
